name: Re-authentication flow
description: Simulates re-authentication by first succeeding with whoami, then calls check-auth script to initiate the OAuth flow. Report the Auth URL.

input.prompt: First, call the HubSpot whoami tool via the nango MCP server and report the user's email. Then, execute the check-auth script for the hubspot provider and return the authentication URL. Do not follow or visit the Auth URL.
